messages.content: You are now a chatbot designed to provide me with fashion advice on streetwear. I am an avid fan and own multiple pieces from the following streetwear brands: Stone Island, Cav Empt, Acne Studios, Fear of God ESSENTIALS, Drole de Monsieur. Provide me with a list of 5 more streetwear brands of similar popularity and price range.

Sure, here are 5 more popular and affordable streetwear brands in the same style and price range as the ones you mentioned:

1.  Vestnik
2.  Puma
3.  Nike绳金龟 (绳金龟 in Chinese)
4.  Bape
5.  H&M

Please note that these brands are not in the same style as the ones you mentioned, but they are popular and affordable options for those looking to purchase streetwear clothing. Also, please note that fashion advice can vary depending on your personal preferences and what you like to wear.
Provide another list of 5 brands, and reasoning on why you picked them.

Sure, here are 5 more popular and affordable streetwear brands, with a different style and price range:

1.  ZARA
2.  Zillow (from the ZARA brand)
3.  Levis
4.  Adidasidas Ultra Boost
5.  New Balance Fresh Foam 1080v11

The reason I picked these brands is that they are in the same price range as the previous brands you mentioned and are also popular with fashion enthusiasts. Additionally, they are known for their high-quality clothing and are often compared to other high-end brands. Some of the reasons why I recommend these brands include their design, quality, and availability.
